questions.question: Seeking disconfirming evidence reduces:
questions.explanation: Actively looking for disconfirming evidence helps overcome confirmation bias.

questions.question: Pre-mortem analysis prevents:
questions.explanation: Pre-mortem analysis helps identify potential problems before they occur, preventing planning errors.

questions.question: Availability heuristic uses:
questions.explanation: Availability heuristic relies on how easily examples come to mind, often favoring vivid cases.

questions.question: Give one common cognitive bias:
questions.explanation: Common biases include confirmation bias, anchoring, availability heuristic, and many others.

questions.question: Describe one practical debiasing technique:
questions.explanation: Debiasing techniques help overcome systematic errors in thinking.
